qas.question: Near what city in Sudan do many Somalis reside?
In what geographical portion of Sudan do some Somalis live?
Along with businesspeople, what sort of Somalis live in Sudan?
In what Somali enclave in Kenya have Somalis invested over $1.5 billion?
In what province of South Africa do Somalis congregate?

context: Besides their traditional areas of inhabitation in Greater Somalia, a Somali community mainly consisting of entrepreneurs, academics, and students also exists in Egypt. In addition, there is an historical Somali community in the general Sudan area. Primarily concentrated in the <a1_0>north<a1_0/> and <a0_0>Khartoum<a0_0/>, the expatriate community mainly consists of <a2_0>students<a2_0/> as well as some businesspeople. More recently, Somali entrepreneurs have established themselves in Kenya, investing over $1.5 billion in the Somali enclave of <a3_0>Eastleigh<a3_0/> alone. In South Africa, Somali businesspeople also provide most of the retail trade in informal settlements around the <a4_0>Western Cape<a4_0/> province.
